common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"merchant_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee’s unique identifier for a merchant. Required for all merchant level requests(CB CNSC user calling global product related APIs)."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, merchant_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Get global item info.Only for China mainland sellers and Korean sellers.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_global_item_shop_not_match
error_list.description: Global item not belong to shop.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Your shop can not use model level dts

error_list.name: error_system_busy
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.
